Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib

Class BroadcastContentManagerTest

java.lang.Object
eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContentManagerTest
public class BroadcastContentManagerTest
extends java.lang.Object
Tests the BroadcastContentManager, notably the latch for unblocking on asynchronous changes.
Author:
Maximilian Schiedermeier on 2019/09/02 maximilian.schiedermeier@mail.mcgill.ca
